title: Movie Quote API
body: API developed with Django rest framework, serves movies and series quotes.

title: TodoList API
body: A todo list app made with django rest framework (DRF).

title: Dang Dong API
body: Travel Share calculating web app called dang dong. Developed with DRF.

title: Film Review API
body: Film review app, Developed with django rest framework.

title: Calendar App
body: A simple calendar written with django. With reminder, event, Solar, Lunar and Gregorian calendar formats.
